DOC.brief_summary: This study investigate process ABT-126 absorbed , distribute , metabolize eliminate body healthy volunteer .
DOC.criteria: Healthy male female subject 18 50 year age If female , subject must postmenopausal least 2 year surgically sterile ( bilateral tubal ligation , bilateral oophorectomy hysterectomy ) If male , subject must surgically sterile ( vasectomy ) agree use barrier method ( i.e. , condom ) birth control start first day confinement 30 day last study drug administration Requirement overthecounter and/or prescription medication , vitamins and/or herbal supplement regular basis History diabetes , cancer ( except basal cell carcinoma skin ) , clinically significant cardiovascular , respiratory ( except mild asthma ) , renal , hepatic , gastrointestinal , hematologic , neurologic psychiatric disease disorder Presence uncontrolled medical illness
